Name: pre-eclampsia
Definition: A hypertension occurring during pregnancy characterized by large amounts of protein in the urine (proteinuria) and edema

Name: malignant hypertension
Definition: A hypertension that is characterized by rapid onset of extremely high blood pressure.

Name: essential hypertension
Definition: A hypertension with no known cause. It is the most common type of hypertension.

Name: obsolete gender identity disorder in adolescent or adult
Definition: A hypertension with no known cause. It is the most common type of hypertension.

Name: secondary hypertension
Definition: A hypersensitivity vasculitis that is characterized by purpura (purplish plaques)

Name: pulmonary hypertension
Definition: A hypertension characterized by an increase of blood pressure in the pulmonary artery
